author: Special Correspondent
text:
Rallies, garlanding the portraits and statues marked the birth anniversary of the AIADMK founder late MGR in different parts of the district on Sunday.

The Salem urban district unit of the AIADMK took out a rally from Periyar statue to MGR statue near the old bus stand in the city. K. M. Selvaraj, MLA and secretary of the urban district unit of the party, led the rally in which V. Panneer Selvam, MP, S. Soundappan, Mayor, G. Venkatachalam, MLA and others participated. The party men later garlanded the statue of MGR.
title: MGR’s birth anniversary observed
